title: What do you think of people who name their musical instruments? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well, I' m not going to say anything bad because my violin teacher, whom I loved to pieces, called her violin George! Personally, I' ve never really got this sort of thing and it may well be something only an older, more romantic, generation does.

I live in Louisiana where jazz, zydeco and the blues reside. If there is an instrument within a 250 mile radius of this state I am absolutely positive that it has a name. And, it is either a woman's name or an animal such as Snake. Instruments have their own personality thus they should have a name.
